item.title: Creating a Blog with Hugo and Obsidian
item.description: Creating a blog with static websites is very easy. This is particularly easy if you are familiar with markdown and use tools like Obsidian. All you need to do is leverage a tool like DigitalOcean to deploy a Hugo template. With this template, a foundation for a blog is available for you to modify yourself. Let’s do it! Required Tools: Git, hugo cli Getting up to Speed with Hugo Find a theme.
